description: This file implements a login/register page using React components and Remix framework. It handles authentication via REST APIs, manages redirects, and sets auth cookies. Contains form handling, loader, and action functions, plus the main React component for the login UI.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Loader function that checks if the user is already authenticated and redirects to '/notes' if so.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles form submission for login or registration, performs API requests, manages cookies and redirects, and handles errors.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: React component rendering the login/register form UI.
